dcterms:description: The NDC texts provide the data basis for the analysis of the translation of global political norms to the local level, particularly focusing on climate protection agreements.
dcterms:title: NDC texts

dcterms:creator: David M. Blei
Andrew Y. Ng
Michael I. Jordan
dcterms:description: The LDA topic model is used to identify different thematic fields within the NDC texts through unsupervised procedures.
dcterms:title: LDA topic model

dcterms:creator: Jeanine Evers
Mauro Caprioli
Stefan Nöst
Gregor Wiedemann
dcterms:description: The REFI-QDA standard is used for data export to support interoperability with other software solutions.
dcterms:title: REFI-QDA standard

dcterms:creator: Kenneth Benoit
Kohei Watanabe
Haiyan Wang
Paul Nulty
Adam Obeng
Stefan Müller
Akitaka Matsuo
dcterms:description: The quanteda package provides tools for the quantitative analysis of textual data, which can be used in conjunction with the iLCM.
dcterms:title: quanteda

dcterms:creator: Andreas Blaette
dcterms:description: The polmineR package provides tools for corpus analysis, which can be utilized in the iLCM for text mining.
dcterms:title: polmineR

dcterms:creator: Markus Hofmann
Ralf Klinkenberg
dcterms:description: RapidMiner is a data mining tool that offers various utilities for data analysis, which can be combined in workflows.
dcterms:title: RapidMiner

dcterms:creator: Michael R. Berthold
Nicolas Cebron
Fabian Dill
Thomas R. Gabriel
Tobias Kötter
Thorsten Meinl
Peter Ohl
Kilian Thiel
Bernd Wiswedel
dcterms:description: KNIME is a data analytics platform that provides a graphical user interface for data mining and analysis.
dcterms:title: KNIME

dcterms:description: MAXQDA is a software solution designed for qualitative data analysis of texts in the social sciences.
dcterms:title: MAXQDA

dcterms:description: Atlas.ti is a software solution for qualitative data analysis, providing tools for analyzing textual data.
dcterms:title: Atlas.ti

dcterms:description: NVivo is a software tool for qualitative data analysis, allowing researchers to analyze text data effectively.
dcterms:title: NVivo
